name: St Joseph's Health Centre Guelph - Young Onset Dementia Program (YODA)
comment:
Adult day program * social, recreational, and therapeutic activities for people with Alzheimer's disease and other related dementia in a group setting for part of the day * helps to support family caregivers who provide day-to-day care
  • meals
  • outings
  • trivia programs
  • music and arts-based programs
  • fitness programs
  • recreational activities

St Joseph's Health Centre Guelph - Young Onset Dementia Program (YODA)

Adult day program * social, recreational, and therapeutic activities for people with Alzheimer's disease and other related dementia in a group setting for part of the day * helps to support family caregivers who provide day-to-day care <br><ul><li>meals</li><li>outings <br></li><li>trivia programs <br></li><li>music and arts-based programs</li><li>fitness programs</li><li>recreational activities<br></li></ul>

Location/e9816a71-1d97-4069-8831-b5553f01a419
